hotels.name: Le Jardin des Douars
hotels.desc: Boutique villa resort, family-friendly, wonderful hospitality, Essaouira
hotels.longDesc: A wonderful hotel offering private villas ideal for groups traveling with small children, providing a sweet spot for family holidays with excellent service and accommodations.

hotels.name: Jnan Erumi
hotels.desc: Newest boutique hotel, stunning interiors, Palmeraie setting, Marrakech oasis
hotels.longDesc: A freshly-opened boutique hotel in Marrakech's serene Palmeraie district, gaining buzz for its exquisite interior design and peaceful garden setting that creates a true Moroccan oasis experience.

hotels.name: Villa Mabrouka
hotels.desc: Luxurious Moroccan villa, traditional riad design, curated travel experience
hotels.longDesc: An elegant Moroccan villa offering authentic hospitality and traditional design in the heart of Marrakech, featured in Tatler's luxury travel collections across Asia and beyond.

hotels.name: Royal Mansour Marrakech
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxury palace-inspired hotel, royal ownership, near royal palaces, opened 2010
hotels.longDesc: A prestigious luxury hotel masterminded by King Mohammed VI and built near one of his palaces, Royal Mansour Marrakech has become one of the region's most sought-after properties since its 2010 opening.

hotels.name: Royal Mansour Casablanca
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxury palace hotel, royal ownership, opened early 2024, contemporary design
hotels.longDesc: King Mohammed VI's second Royal Mansour property, opened in early 2024 in Casablanca, continuing the royal family's foray into ultra-luxury hospitality.

hotels.name: Royal Mansour Tamuda Bay
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxury coastal resort, Alboran Sea location, royal ownership, Mediterranean setting
hotels.longDesc: King Mohammed VI's third Royal Mansour property, positioned along the Alboran Sea coastline in northern Morocco, representing the royal expansion into coastal luxury hospitality.

hotels.name: La Fiermontina Ocean
hotels.desc: Luxe oceanfront resort, minimalist mid-century design, community philanthropy, Atlantic coast views
hotels.longDesc: A tribute to Antonia Fiermonte's legacy, this luxury resort combines stunning ocean vistas with minimalist mid-century aesthetics and a deep commitment to local community support.

hotels.name: Jardins de Villa Maroc
hotels.desc: Luxury Moroccan villa resort, stunning gardens, cultural elegance, architectural beauty
hotels.longDesc: An exquisite Moroccan villa resort featuring breathtaking traditional gardens and luxurious accommodations that showcase Moroccan design and cultural heritage.

hotels.name: Izza Marrakech
hotels.desc: Boutique Moroccan riad, traditional charm, adult-focused luxury
hotels.longDesc: A sophisticated boutique riad in Marrakech featuring traditional Moroccan design and contemporary luxury, best suited for adult travelers seeking refined relaxation.
hotels.address: 46 Driba Laarida, Dar IZZA, 46 Sidi Ahmed Soussi, Marrakesh 40000, Morocco

hotels.name: Dar Ahlam
hotels.desc: House of Dreams, remote desert villa, adventure and romance combined
hotels.longDesc: A dramatically situated remote desert villa known as the 'House of Dreams,' offering scenic hikes ending in picnics and sunset cocktails on cushion-strewn hilltops.
hotels.address: Douar Oulad Cheik Ali, Kouche√Øt 00000, Morocco

hotels.name: Riad karmela
hotels.desc: Charming family riad, traditional architecture, peaceful courtyard with pool
hotels.longDesc: A welcoming traditional riad perfect for families, offering authentic Moroccan hospitality with modern comfort. The serene courtyard and warm ambiance make children feel at home.
hotels.address: Azbetz, 10 Derb El Ferrane, Marrakech 40000, Morocco

hotels.name: Hotel Le Golf D'Essaouira & Spa
hotels.desc: Beachfront luxury resort, oceanfront views, family pools, water sports access
hotels.longDesc: This spectacular beachfront resort combines luxury with family fun, featuring multiple pools, direct beach access, and activities that keep children entertained throughout the day.

restaurants.name: La Mouette et les Dromadaires
restaurants.desc: Local seafood restaurant, giant turbot, unbelievably delicious, Essaouira
restaurants.longDesc: A standout local restaurant in Essaouira known for exceptional fresh seafood, particularly their impressive turbot dishes that leave lasting impressions on diners.

restaurants.name: Restaurant "Fez Caf√©"
restaurants.desc: Rooftop caf√©, traditional Moroccan cuisine, panoramic medina views, family-friendly
restaurants.longDesc: Perched above the bustling medina with stunning rooftop views, this beloved caf√© serves authentic Moroccan dishes in a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere perfect for families.

restaurants.name: Le Trou Au Mur Restaurant and Roof terrace
restaurants.desc: Casual coastal restaurant, fresh seafood, ocean views, relaxed beach vibe
restaurants.longDesc: A charming, unpretentious spot in the coastal village serving the freshest catch daily. Families appreciate the laid-back atmosphere and delicious, simple preparations.
restaurants.photoAttribution: Le Trou Au Mur Restaurant and Roof terrace

restaurants.name: Caf√© des √âpices
restaurants.desc: Rooftop terrace overlooking spice souk with Moroccan salads and tagines

restaurants.name: P√¢tisserie Amandine
restaurants.desc: French-Moroccan pastry shop with excellent coffee and fresh croissants
restaurants.address: 177 Rue Mohammed el Beqal, Marrakech 40000, Morocco

restaurants.name: Nomad Marrakech
restaurants.desc: Modern Moroccan cuisine with rooftop views of the medina

restaurants.name: Dar Yacout
restaurants.desc: Traditional Moroccan palace dining with multi-course family-style feast
restaurants.address: NO 79ÿå Derb Sidi Ahmed Soussi, ŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ¥ 40000, Morocco

restaurants.name: Le Jardin Restaurant Marrakech Medina
restaurants.desc: Garden restaurant in medina with Moroccan-European fusion and kids menu
restaurants.address: 32 Souk Jeld Sidi Abdelaziz, Marrakesh 40000, Morocco

restaurants.name: Taros
restaurants.desc: Multi-level venue with rooftop terrace serving Mediterranean-Moroccan fusion

restaurants.name: Ocean Vagabond
restaurants.desc: Beachfront restaurant serving fresh seafood and Moroccan cuisine

restaurants.name: Umia
restaurants.desc: Intimate restaurant serving refined Moroccan cuisine with ocean ingredients

restaurants.name: La Table by Madada
restaurants.desc: Fine dining restaurant with Moroccan-Mediterranean fusion cuisine and rooftop terrace
restaurants.address: 7 Rue Youssef El Fassi, Essaouira 44000, Morocco

restaurants.name: Triskala
restaurants.desc: Family-friendly restaurant with Moroccan classics and live music

restaurants.name: Elizir art Gallery
restaurants.desc: Contemporary Moroccan restaurant with terrace dining
restaurants.address: 22 avenue al hadadda al istiklal, Essaouira 44000, Morocco

restaurants.name: Caravane Caf√©
restaurants.desc: Popular caf√© in Essaouira medina serving light meals and refreshments
restaurants.address: 2 bis Rue Qadi Ayad, Essaouira 44000, Morocco

experiences.name: Jardin Majorelle
experiences.desc: Stunning botanical garden, vibrant blue architecture, peaceful walkways, art museum included
experiences.longDesc: This enchanting garden captivates visitors of all ages with its exotic plants, striking cobalt structures, and serene pathways. The attached museum adds cultural depth to your visit.
experiences.address: Rue Yves St Laurent, Marrakech 40090, Morocco

experiences.name: Tinghir
experiences.desc: Dramatic canyon landscape, scenic hiking trails, river activities, breathtaking geology
experiences.longDesc: One of Morocco's most spectacular natural wonders, this towering gorge offers family-friendly hiking and exploration. The dramatic canyon walls and river create unforgettable memories.

experiences.name: Skala de la Ville
experiences.desc: Historic sea bastion with cannons overlooking the Atlantic, part of Essaouira's UNESCO ramparts

experiences.name: Plage d'Essaouira
experiences.desc: Main beach in Essaouira with camel rides and water sports available

experiences.name: Coop√©rative Tamount
experiences.desc: Women's argan oil cooperative and shop in the medina selling authentic local products

kidFriendly.name: Oasiria-Amizmiz Waterpark
kidFriendly.desc: Water park with slides, pools, splash zones, perfect family day out attraction
kidFriendly.longDesc: A wonderful tropical water park where children splash and play safely. Multiple pools and slides keep kids entertained while parents relax in this vibrant family destination.

markets.name: Jemaa el-Fnaa
markets.desc: Historic main square, street food stalls, local vendors, performers, sensory experience
markets.longDesc: Morocco's most iconic marketplace buzzes with energy and tradition. Families enjoy sampling local delicacies, watching street performers, and immersing themselves in authentic Moroccan culture.

a.name: Morocco Family Magic: Marrakech to the Coast (8 Days)
a.description: From enchanted gardens and vibrant souks to Atlantic beaches and waterpark splashes, this journey balances Morocco's cultural treasures with perfect family downtime.
